name: simple-pg
description: A simplified api against Postgresql using promises and objects Edit

scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && git push origin master --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor && npm publish && git push origin master --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm version major && npm publish && git push origin master --follow-tags
